clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Identification Badge on Situation Awareness During High Fidelity Simulation
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Identification Badge on Situation Awareness During High Fidelity Simulation

collaborator.agency: Centre d'apprentissage des attitudes et des habiletés cliniques (CAAHC)

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate if the use of identification badge (role and place) during high-fidelity simulation as an impact on situation awareness.

detailed_description.textblock: High-fidelity simulation is well recognized as an educational tool. Mr. Issenberg completed a review(2005) that determined features of high-fidelity simulation training that lead to effective learning. It this review, it is mentioned that the validity of the simulator (realism) is essential to help learners to increase their skills and sharpen their responses. It is essential to get and maintain engagement during high-fidelity simulation and it pass by an increase in realism and situation awareness. The purpose of this study is to evaluate if the use of identification badge (physical and conceptual realism) during high-fidelity simulation as an impact on situation awareness and engagement.

primary_outcome.description: Subjects answer a 4 questions survey on situation awareness with 7 answers choices (1-strongly disagree... 7-strongly agree) I know where I was in the beginning of the scenario I know where I was during the scenario I know the role of each participant in the beginning of the scenario I Know the role of each participant during the scenario

secondary_outcome.description: Subject answer a 2 questions survey on engagement with a 7 answers choices (1- strongly disagree...7-strongly agree) I felt emotionally concerned during the scenario The scenario was enough realistic to get engaged in the clinical situation

arm_group.description: Use of Identification badge during scenarios (roles and places)

intervention.intervention_name: Use of identification badge during scenarios
